name: What Nice Weather
description:
Movement - WASD

Look - Mouse movement

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

This cartoony zombie shooter takes place in Washington Square Park, New York and utilizes access to weather APIs to set the in game weather and time of day.

I think the WebGL build is working as expected but was having some errors pulling the weather data in browser. If there are any issues, feel free to reach out to me.

3rd Party Assets Used: Models, Animations, Weather System

Source Code : https://github.com/mcr431/What...
